properties.name: Petra
properties.description: Rose-red city half-carved into rock, one of the New Seven Wonders of the World

properties.name: Wadi Rum
properties.description: Mars-like red desert with sandstone mountains, film location for Star Wars and The Martian

properties.name: Dead Sea
properties.description: Lowest point on Earth at -430m, with hypersaline waters for effortless floating
